tool_description: Creates and configures virtual meeting spaces with appropriate settings based on meeting type, duration, and participant count.

meeting_type.description: Type of virtual meeting (webinar, conference, training, interview)

waiting_room.description: Whether to enable waiting room feature

error_messages: Invalid meeting type: meeting_type must be one of webinar, conference, training, interview.
Invalid duration: duration_minutes must be between 15 and 600.
Invalid participant count: max_participants must be between 2 and 1000.
Invalid security level: security_level must be one of standard, high, enterprise.
Virtual space creation failed: Unable to provision virtual meeting space due to system limitations.
usage: Specify meeting type, duration, and participant count. Optional settings include recording, waiting room, and security level. Returns virtual meeting details and access links.

host_key.description: Host access key for meeting control

success.description: Whether virtual space was successfully created
